template.name: Nevis
template.description:
## Overview
Template for monitoring Nevis Appliances (nevis mib only).
Not all of the items are in there but the most for admin, proxy and auth have been added with also some triggers.
The template is built with discovery Rules only.
## Author
Stefan MÃ¼ller

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAdminJVMKBHeapUsage
item_prototype.description: Usage of the heap within the Java virtual machine in kbytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAdminName
item_prototype.description: The instance name we're counting/checking on.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAdminStatus
item_prototype.description: Indicates if the instance has been started (=1) or stopped (=0).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceCicapDStatus
item_prototype.description: Status of the c-icap daemon.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceCouchbaseStatus
item_prototype.description: Number of running couchbase server processes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceDiskDeviceOnline
item_prototype.description: The number of disk devices which are online (used to monitor disk mirroring).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceElasticsearchStatus
item_prototype.description: Indicates if the elasticsearch process is running (1).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceFreeDiskSpace
item_prototype.description: Free disk space in kbytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceFreeSwap
item_prototype.description: Free swap memory in mbytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceFreshClamStatus
item_prototype.description: Freshclam status.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceLoad
item_prototype.description: System load

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceLogstashForwarderStatus
item_prototype.description: Indicates if the logstash forwarder process is running (1).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceLogstashStatus
item_prototype.description: Indicates if the logstash process is running (1).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceMySqlClusterConnectedNodes
item_prototype.description: The number of connected MySQL cluster nodes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceMySqlClusterNDBCNodes
item_prototype.description: The number of running ndbmtd processes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceMySqlClusterNDBFreePages
item_prototype.description: Free data pages of the local NDB node.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceMySqlClusterNDBMGRNodes
item_prototype.description: The number of running ndb_mgmd processes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceMySqlNodes
item_prototype.description: The number of running mysqld processes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceMySqlSlaveStatus
item_prototype.description: The slave status (replication).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceApplianceVersion
item_prototype.description: The software version information.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAuthCPU
item_prototype.description: CPU utilization (ps -o pcpu) of the working nevisAuth process in percent.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAuthErrors
item_prototype.description: Number of error messages within the last 5 minutes which are currently within the esauth4sv.log file (Linux only).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAuthJVMKBHeapLimit
item_prototype.description: Configured max. heap (Xmx) in kbytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAuthJVMKBHeapUsage
item_prototype.description: Usage of the heap within the Java virtual machine in kbytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAuthMemory
item_prototype.description: Memory consumption (virtual memory size) of the working nevisAuth process in kbytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAuthName
item_prototype.description: The instance name we're counting/checking on.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAuthStatus
item_prototype.description: Indicates if the instance has been started (=1) or stopped (=0).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceAuthVersion
item_prototype.description: The software version information.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceKeyboxKeystoreExp
item_prototype.description: Number of own certificates expiring within 30 days

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceKeyboxName
item_prototype.description: The instance name we're counting/checking on.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceKeyboxTruststoreExp
item_prototype.description: Number of trusted certificates expiring within 30 days.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceConnectionsLimit
item_prototype.description: Number of the configured MaxClients value.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxyAuthentication05
item_prototype.description: Number of successfull authentication process per minute (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceBytesPerSec
item_prototype.description: Bytes per second downloaded via this instance (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxyConenctions
item_prototype.description: Number of establish TCP connections to the observed instance.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxyCPU1s
item_prototype.description: Current CPU utilization (top/prstat) of the working nevisProxy process in percent.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxyCPU
item_prototype.description: CPU utilization (ps -o pcpu) of the working nevisProxy process in percent.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxyErrors
item_prototype.description: Number of error messages within the last 5 minutes which are currently within the navajo.log and apache.log files (Linux only).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceFailoverStatus
item_prototype.description: Indicates instance status (1=okay, 0=failure) for a failover cluster.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxyMemory
item_prototype.description: Memory consumption (virtual memory size) of the working nevisProxy process in kbytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxyReqPerSec
item_prototype.description: Number of requests per second processed by the instnce (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceResponse1xx
item_prototype.description: Number of requests per minute with the response status code 100-199 (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceResponse2xx
item_prototype.description: Number of requests per minute with the response status code 200-299 (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceResponse3xx
item_prototype.description: Number of requests per minute with the response status code 300-399 (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceResponse4xx
item_prototype.description: Number of requests per minute with the response status code 400-499 (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceResponse5xx
item_prototype.description: Number of requests per minute with the response status code 500-599 (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceResponseTime
item_prototype.description: Average request duration (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxySessionsCreated01
item_prototype.description: Number of sessions created per minute (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxySessions
item_prototype.description: Number of busy sessions of the observed instance (optional).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxyStatus
item_prototype.description: Indicates if the instance has been started (=1) or stopped (=0).

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceProxyVersion
item_prototype.description: The software version information.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: nevisinstanceSessionsLimit
item_prototype.description: Number of maxEntries configured for the local HTTP session cache.
